segments.text: If you wanna keep healthy , you must give up smoking . It's extremely bad for your health , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know it's not good for me , but the problem is I just can't help it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I've got an idea , put the label cancer sticks on each pack of cigarettes , and read it before you smoke . It may give you a feeling to reduce it .
segments.speaker: S1
